body.name: Wopuzr Vinyl Siding Angle Adjustment Mount Compatible with Video Doorbell/Video Doorbell 2,3,4,3Plus(4" Standard Vinyl Siding Only)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 34 mins
features: Special Note: Not compatible with Triple 3 siding or Dutchlap siding! DOES NOT work with Video Doorbell Pro!
Wider Compatibility: This mount fits Video Doorbell 2/3/3 Plus Video Doorbell for standard style wall panels.

Easy installation: With screws, you don't have to worry about installation, and easy installation is a good solution to the angle problem of the video doorbell. Compatible with cement board siding, aluminum siding, regular 4" cedar siding, and vinyl siding.
Excellent Material: The material is durable and fits perfectly with the doorbell, the surface is smooth and not rough and easy to clean.
Perfect service: If there is any problem with the product, you can contact us at any time, we will refund or send you a new product.
body.description: This mount is the solution to the problem where when screwing to slanted siding or vinyl, your doorbell would face in the upward direction. With this mount that problem can be eliminated so that your doorbell faces straight ahead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Butted up perfectly to existed vinyl siding. The screws were kind of short so didn't screw into the house, just the siding, but once installed. It won't come off of the siding easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have siding on my house. I received a second generation Ring doorbell as a gift. The bracket that comes with the doorbell, is intended for a flat surface. To create a flat surface for the doorbell, I needed an additional bracket to accommodate the slanted siding, and give me a flat surface to mount the ring bracket and doorbell to. This bracket is well-made, and is shaped correctly to mount on siding, for the doorbell. What makes it frustrating, is the screw holes. They are perfectly aligned for the Ring doorbell, but the holes are too small for the screws provided with the doorbell. It’s important do use the screws provided with the doorbell, in order not to void any warranty. Finding the right drillbit, and the right drill, to drill into the bracket, making the holes large enough to fit Rings provided screws. I spent a lot of time trying to find the right, drill & drill bit. Once I got the holes drilled out, everything went together perfectly. This bracket does provide a sturdy mount for the doorbell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not compatible with Gen 2
reviews.reviewText: Received product and the whole were not in the same place as pictured. They did not line up with my Gen 2 so I had to send it back. Does not work if you have stairs and need it angled down.
